SocketServer - Class in com.likbilen.protorpc.socket
A server that accepts connections from socket channel Usage example: SocketServer srv = new SocketServer(service); //Make the server shut down when a client disconnects, which makes the program close by itself srv.setShutDownOnDisconnect(true); //Bind the serversocket to a port srv.getServerSocket().bind(new InetSocketAddress(port)); //Start the server srv.start();
SocketServer(Service) - Constructor for class com.likbilen.protorpc.socket.SocketServer
Create a socket server, the ServerSocket available from getServerSocket() should be called before it is started.
start() - Method in class com.likbilen.protorpc.socket.SocketServer
Start this server socket.
start() - Method in class com.likbilen.protorpc.stream.TwoWayStream
Start the stream, must be called before calling callMethod
